summary: 1998 CHRYSLER SEBRING CONVERTIBLE: BRAKE WORK.  AFTER HAVING MY BRAKES REPAIRED THREE TIMES I NOW HEAR THERE IS A PROBLEM WITH THE MASTER CYLINDER.  I JUST REPLACED IT AS WELL AS THE ROTARS A SECOND TIME.*AK  REAR WINDOW DEFROSTER HAS SEPARATED FROM THE GLASS JUST AS LISTED ON YOUR PROBLEMS.
